scripts.build: yarn run build-css && yarn run build-js
scripts.deploy-test: aws s3 sync build/static s3://test-takeabreak-web/static --size-only --delete --acl public-read --cache-control max-age=31536000 --profile wit && aws s3 sync build s3://test-takeabreak-web --exclude static/* --size-only --delete --acl public-read --profile wit && aws s3 cp build/service-worker.js s3://test-takeabreak-web/service-worker.js --acl public-read --cache-control no-cache --profile wit && aws s3 cp build/index.html s3://test-takeabreak-web/index.html --acl public-read --cache-control no-cache --profile wit && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E16T92AA3CQF3P --paths /index.html --profile wit
scripts.deploy-prod: aws s3 sync build/static s3://takeabreak-web/static --size-only --delete --acl public-read --cache-control max-age=31536000 --profile wit && aws s3 sync build s3://takeabreak-web --exclude static/* --size-only --delete --acl public-read --profile wit && aws s3 cp build/service-worker.js s3://takeabreak-web/service-worker.js --acl public-read --cache-control no-cache --profile wit && aws s3 cp build/index.html s3://takeabreak-web/index.html --acl public-read --cache-control no-cache --profile wit && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E1G6UHDXNDOUN --paths /index.html --profile wit
